shopifyCollection.description: Easy add ons to any purchase at Oxford Pennant.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Easy add ons to any purchase at Oxford Pennant.

products.title: It's Not That Bad Pint Glass
products.description: It's not that bad. And you'll never forget it when you're drinking beer out of this pint glass.
products.descriptionHtml: It's not that bad. And you'll never forget it when you're drinking beer out of this pint glass.

products.title: Let's Go Buffalo Mini Pennant
products.description: Hey ey ey ey! Western New Yorkers know this one by heart. Wave this custom pennant from the rafters of the Key Bank Center to the Ralph. This is Buffalo Sports. Available in a stitched banner, championship banner, and outdoor flag Size: 4" x 9" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design Color: Navy
products.descriptionHtml:
Hey ey ey ey! Western New Yorkers know this one by heart. Wave this custom pennant from the rafters of the Key Bank Center to the Ralph. This is Buffalo Sports.

Available in a stitched banner, championship banner, and outdoor flag

Size: 4" x 9"

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design 

Color: Navy

products.title: The Prettiest Girls in the World Live in Buffalo Bumper Sticker
products.description: Make sure no one knows where the prettiest girls in the world live with this bumper sticker. Size: 11.5" x 3"
products.descriptionHtml:
Make sure no one knows where the prettiest girls in the world live with this bumper sticker.

products.title: Buffalo Enamel Pin • Lost Lust Supply x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: Created in collaboration with our partners at Lost Lust, we created a uniquely Buffalo pin for any hat, jacket, backpack, or pin keeper.
products.descriptionHtml: Created in collaboration with our partners at Lost Lust, we created a uniquely Buffalo pin for any hat, jacket, backpack, or pin keeper.

products.title: Buffalo Button Pack • Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} A three-pack of buttons to show your Buffalo pride. Guaranteed to make your favorite jean jacket even cooler. Button sayings: Keep Buffalo A Secret; BUF; Let's Go Buffalo Size: 1.5" Color: Multi
products.descriptionHtml:
A three-pack of buttons to show your Buffalo pride. Guaranteed to make your favorite jean jacket even cooler.

Button sayings: Keep Buffalo A Secret; BUF; Let's Go Buffalo 

Size: 1.5"

Color: Multi

products.title: This Sucks Mini Pennant
products.description: I think we can all agree: this sucks. Size: 4" x 9" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design Color: Black

products.title: Yes You Can Enamel Pin • Kelle Hampton x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome. A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education.
products.descriptionHtml: This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome.  A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education.

products.title: Keep Buffalo A Secret Tee
products.description: Shhhh! We don't want anyone to know, but if you have to tell people, show your Buffalo pride with this t-shirt. Size Guide: This is a leaner fit XS S M ﻿L XL XXL Width (Inches) 21.875 22.75 23.675 24.5 25.375 26.25 Length (Inches) 26 27 28 29 30 31 Material: Premium quality ringspun and compacted cotton. 40 Singles Jersey 100% Cotton. Color: White

products.title: Wasn't Me! Embroidered Patch
products.description: It never is. This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. Size: 3.5" Color: Black
products.descriptionHtml:
It never is. 

This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.

Size: 3.5"

Color: Black

products.title: Warmest Cold City™ Bumper Sticker
products.description: Slap this on your riding mower or mini van, and show your pride for WNY. Size: 11.3" x 3" All-weather Bumper Sticker

products.title: Oxford Pennant Coffee Mug
products.description: Wish you never heard of Oxford Pennant? Let's be honest, us too. Remind yourself regularly that you spend too much on pieces of felt with this mug.

products.title: Boooooring Enamel Pin
products.description: (Yawn) This enamel pin is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. This design is also available as an embroidered patch. Size: 1.4" tall

(Yawn)

This enamel pin is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.
